parameters.name: connectivity
parameters.description:
* `-` - Unknown
* `na` - N/A
* `ok` - OK
* `err` - Error
* `rdp_err` - RDP error
* `auth_err` - Authentication error
* `password_err` - Invalid password error
* `openssh_key_err` - OpenSSH key error
* `ntlm_err` - NTLM credentials rejected error
* `create_temp_err` - Create temporary error

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: secret_type
parameters.description:
* `password` - Password
* `ssh_key` - SSH key
* `access_key` - Access key
* `token` - Token
* `api_key` - API key

parameters.name: mfa_level
parameters.description:
* `0` - Disabled
* `1` - Enabled
* `2` - Force enabled

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description:
* `local` - Local
* `ldap` - LDAP/AD
* `ldap_ha` - LDAP/AD (HA)
* `openid` - OpenID
* `radius` - Radius
* `cas` - CAS
* `saml2` - SAML2
* `oauth2` - OAuth2
* `wecom` - WeCom
* `dingtalk` - DingTalk
* `feishu` - FeiShu
* `lark` - Lark
* `slack` - Slack
* `custom` - Custom

Account.description:
通过API批量操作资源时, 自动给每个资源添加所需属性org_id的值为current_org_id
(同时为serializer.is_valid()对Model的unique_together校验做准备)
由于HiddenField字段不可读，API获取资产信息时获取不到org_id，
但是coco需要资产的org_id字段，所以修改为CharField类型

username.description: * If no username is required for authentication, enter null.  For AD accounts, use the format username@domain.

auto_push.description: Whether to automatically push the account to the asset

ActionsEnum.description:
* `connect` - Connect (All protocols)
* `upload` - Upload (RDP, SFTP)
* `download` - Download (RDP, SFTP)
* `copy` - Copy (RDP, VNC)
* `paste` - Paste (RDP, VNC)
* `delete` - Delete (SFTP)
* `share` - Share (Web SSH, Web RDP, Web VNC)

由于HiddenField字段不可读，API获取资产信息时获取不到org_id，
但是coco需要资产的org_id字段，所以修改为CharField类型

PatchedPlatform.description: 可以控制显示不同的字段，mini 最少，small 不包含关系

gateway_enabled.description: Assets can be connected using a zone gateway

su_enabled.description: Login with account when accessing assets, then automatically switch to another, similar to logging in with a regular account and then switching to root

PatchedUser.description:
Become rest_framework_bulk not support uuid as a primary key
so rewrite it. https://github.com/miki725/django-rest-framework-bulk/issues/66

source.description: User source identifies where the user was created, which could be AD or other sources.There are security settings that can restrict users to log in to the system only from the sources.
source.title: Source

org_roles.description: Org roles are roles at the organization level, and they will only take effect within current organization

system_roles.description: System roles are roles at the system level, and they will take effect across all organizations

default.label: Reset link will be generated and sent to the user

gateways.title: Gateway
gateways.description: A gateway is a network proxy for a zone, and when connecting assets within the zone, the connection is routed through the gateway.

primary.description: This protocol is primary, and it must be set when adding assets. Additionally, there can only be one primary protocol.

required.description: This protocol is required, and it must be set when adding assets.

default.description: This protocol is default, when adding assets, it will be displayed by default.

public.description: This protocol is public, asset will show this protocol to user

TypeEnum.description:
* `str` - str
* `password` - password
* `int` - int
* `bool` - bool
* `text` - text
* `choice` - choice
* `list` - list
